commentBody:
Speaking as a student on a large public university campus, there is no cross over between these "bros" and the Bernie Sanders base. Bernie Sanders has campaigned for decades for the political rights of all minorities.

This article is the sort of fear mongering, uninformed polemic that has me sadly loosing respect for a newspaper I've always trusted. Like Madeline Albrights comments on Hillary Clinton, this article seems to be geared toward forcing women into the Hillary Clinton camp by virtue of their gender.

This article serves no purpose beyond uniformed anti-Sanders rhetoric. If the author or newspaper respect their integrity or the reputation of the civil rights activist that you've blindly attacked, at least stop beating around the bush.
